Simple Python example for perceptron learning

theory.text: Perceptron ek simple linear classifier hai jo input features ka weighted sum leta hai aur threshold ke basis par class predict karta hai. Yeh binary classification ka basic model hai...
Weights ko update karne ka rule: w := w + learning_rate * (y_true - y_pred) * x. Example ke liye consider karte hain sample training points...

examples.content:
from sklearn.linear_model import Perceptron
X = [[0,0],[0,1],[1,0],[1,1]]
y = [0,0,0,1]
clf = Perceptron().fit(X,y)
print(clf.predict([[1,1]]))
